g_con_table_name  CONSTANT     VARCHAR2(61) := 'PDM_PROCESS_PARAMETERS';
g_lock_conflicts  PLS_INTEGER := 0;


FUNCTION ppr_select_row( i_ppr_ID   IN  pdm_process_parameters.ID%TYPE
                       , o_rt_ppr   OUT pdm_process_parameters%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

                           , o_rt_ppr   OUT pdm_process_parameters%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

PROCEDURE ppr_lock_row( i_ppr_ID   IN  pdm_process_parameters.ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE ppr_lock_row_nowait( i_ppr_ID   IN  pdm_process_parameters.ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE ppr_insert_row ( io_rt_ppr  IN OUT pdm_process_parameters%ROWTYPE )
;

FUNCTION ppr_update_row( i_ppr_ID   IN     pdm_process_parameters.ID%TYPE
                       , io_rt_ppr  IN OUT pdm_process_parameters%ROWTYPE )
RETURN NUMBER
;

FUNCTION ppr_delete_row( i_ppr_ID   IN  pdm_process_parameters.ID%TYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

RETURN pdm_process_parameters.ID%TYPE
;


END pdm_ppr_tapi_pck;

function ppr_select_row( i_ppr_id   in  pdm_process_parameters.id%type
                       , o_rt_ppr   out pdm_process_parameters%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ppr_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_ppr ( i_ppr_id   in  pdm_process_parameters.id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from pdm_process_parameters ppr
            where ppr.id = i_ppr_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_ppr( i_ppr_id => i_ppr_id );
         fetch c_ppr into o_rt_ppr;
         l_found := c_ppr%found;
         close c_ppr;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_ppr%isopen
         then
            close c_ppr;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ppr_select_row;

function ppr_select_row_upd( i_ppr_id   in  pdm_process_parameters.id%type
                           , o_rt_ppr   out pdm_process_parameters%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ppr_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_ppr ( i_ppr_id   in  pdm_process_parameters.id%type )
   is
           select *
             from pdm_process_parameters ppr
            where ppr.id = i_ppr_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_ppr( i_ppr_id => i_ppr_id );
   fetch c_ppr into o_rt_ppr;
   l_found := c_ppr%found;
   close c_ppr;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_ppr%isopen
      then
         close c_ppr;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end ppr_select_row_upd;

procedure ppr_lock_row( i_ppr_id   in  pdm_process_parameters.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ppr_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_ppr ( i_ppr_id   in  pdm_process_parameters.id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from pdm_process_parameters ppr
              where ppr.id = i_ppr_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_ppr_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                ppr_lock_row_nowait( i_ppr_id => i_ppr_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_ppr( i_ppr_id => i_ppr_id );
                  close c_ppr;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_ppr%isopen
         then
            close c_ppr;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ppr_lock_row;

procedure ppr_lock_row_nowait( i_ppr_id   in  pdm_process_parameters.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ppr_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_ppr ( i_ppr_id   in  pdm_process_parameters.id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from pdm_process_parameters ppr
               where ppr.id = i_ppr_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_ppr_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_ppr( i_ppr_id => i_ppr_id );

            close c_ppr;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_ppr%isopen
        then
           close c_ppr;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_ppr_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end ppr_lock_row_nowait;

function ppr_perform_update( i_ppr_id   in     pdm_process_parameters.id%type

return boolean

procedure ppr_insert_row ( io_rt_ppr  in out pdm_process_parameters%rowtype )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ppr_insert_row';
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      
      begin
         insert into pdm_process_parameters( id
                                , adn_id
                                , psn_id
                                , pcs_id
                                , aty_id
                                , pse_id
                                , tpr_id
                                , value )
              values ( io_rt_ppr.id
                     , io_rt_ppr.adn_id
                     , io_rt_ppr.psn_id
                     , io_rt_ppr.pcs_id
                     , io_rt_ppr.aty_id
                     , io_rt_ppr.pse_id
                     , io_rt_ppr.tpr_id
                     , io_rt_ppr.value )
           returning id
                   , adn_id
                   , psn_id
                   , pcs_id
                   , aty_id
                   , pse_id
                   , tpr_id
                   , value
                into io_rt_ppr.id
                   , io_rt_ppr.adn_id
                   , io_rt_ppr.psn_id
                   , io_rt_ppr.pcs_id
                   , io_rt_ppr.aty_id
                   , io_rt_ppr.pse_id
                   , io_rt_ppr.tpr_id
                   , io_rt_ppr.value;

      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_insertfailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_ppr.id||'"'
                                                             ||', ADN_ID = "'||io_rt_ppr.adn_id||'"'
                                                             ||', PSN_ID = "'||io_rt_ppr.psn_id||'"'
                                                             ||', PCS_ID = "'||io_rt_ppr.pcs_id||'"'
                                                             ||', ATY_ID = "'||io_rt_ppr.aty_id||'"'
                                                             ||', PSE_ID = "'||io_rt_ppr.pse_id||'"'
                                                             ||', TPR_ID = "'||io_rt_ppr.tpr_id||'"'
                                                             ||', VALUE = "'||io_rt_ppr.value||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ppr_insert_row;

function ppr_perform_update( i_ppr_id   in     pdm_process_parameters.id%type
                           , io_rt_ppr  in out pdm_process_parameters%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ppr_perform_update';
begin
   
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         update pdm_process_parameters
            set id = io_rt_ppr.id
              , adn_id = io_rt_ppr.adn_id
              , psn_id = io_rt_ppr.psn_id
              , pcs_id = io_rt_ppr.pcs_id
              , aty_id = io_rt_ppr.aty_id
              , pse_id = io_rt_ppr.pse_id
              , tpr_id = io_rt_ppr.tpr_id
              , value = io_rt_ppr.value
          where id = i_ppr_id
      returning id
              , adn_id
              , psn_id
              , pcs_id
              , aty_id
              , pse_id
              , tpr_id
              , value
           into io_rt_ppr.id
              , io_rt_ppr.adn_id
              , io_rt_ppr.psn_id
              , io_rt_ppr.pcs_id
              , io_rt_ppr.aty_id
              , io_rt_ppr.pse_id
              , io_rt_ppr.tpr_id
              , io_rt_ppr.value;

         l_rowcount := sql%rowcount;
      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_ppr.id||'"'
                                                             ||', ADN_ID = "'||io_rt_ppr.adn_id||'"'
                                                             ||', PSN_ID = "'||io_rt_ppr.psn_id||'"'
                                                             ||', PCS_ID = "'||io_rt_ppr.pcs_id||'"'
                                                             ||', ATY_ID = "'||io_rt_ppr.aty_id||'"'
                                                             ||', PSE_ID = "'||io_rt_ppr.pse_id||'"'
                                                             ||', TPR_ID = "'||io_rt_ppr.tpr_id||'"'
                                                             ||', VALUE = "'||io_rt_ppr.value||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount)||' rows updated' );

      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ppr_perform_update;

function ppr_perform_delete( i_ppr_id   in  pdm_process_parameters.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ppr_perform_delete';
begin
   
   declare
      l_found  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         delete
           from pdm_process_parameters
          where id = i_ppr_id;

         l_found := sql%found;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );
      return l_found;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_ppr_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end ppr_perform_delete;

function ppr_update_row( i_ppr_id   in     pdm_process_parameters.id%type
                       , io_rt_ppr  in out pdm_process_parameters%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ppr_update_row';
begin
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         ppr_lock_row( i_ppr_id   =>  i_ppr_id );

         
         l_rowcount := 
            ppr_perform_update( i_ppr_id   =>  i_ppr_id
                              , io_rt_ppr  => io_rt_ppr );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount) ||' rows updated');
      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_ppr.id||'"'
                                                          ||', ADN_ID = "'||io_rt_ppr.adn_id||'"'
                                                          ||', PSN_ID = "'||io_rt_ppr.psn_id||'"'
                                                          ||', PCS_ID = "'||io_rt_ppr.pcs_id||'"'
                                                          ||', ATY_ID = "'||io_rt_ppr.aty_id||'"'
                                                          ||', PSE_ID = "'||io_rt_ppr.pse_id||'"'
                                                          ||', TPR_ID = "'||io_rt_ppr.tpr_id||'"'
                                                          ||', VALUE = "'||io_rt_ppr.value||'"'                                                           , 1, 4000));
   end;                                                          
end ppr_update_row;

function ppr_delete_row( i_ppr_id   in  pdm_process_parameters.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ppr_delete_row';
begin
   declare
      l_deleted  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         ppr_lock_row( i_ppr_id   =>  i_ppr_id );

         
         l_deleted := ppr_perform_delete( i_ppr_id   =>  i_ppr_id );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_deleted;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_ppr_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end ppr_delete_row;

function ppr_seq1_nextval
return pdm_process_parameters.id%type
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ppr_seq1_nextval';
   l_ppr_id  pdm_process_parameters.id%type;
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         select pdm_ppr_seq1.nextval 
           into l_ppr_id
           from dual;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_ppr_id;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ppr_seq1_nextval;


end pdm_ppr_tapi_pck;
